markdownRemark.html:
The Code Labs Blog

With all the various steps involved in building a portfolio, I had to make a decision on whether I was going to create my own blog to supplement my portfolio. Perhaps a portfolio website containing only project-related content would suffice. Maybe I do not need to go "above and beyond" and start a blog. I decided that having a blog to write about would exercise some of my critical thinking skills when it comes to coding. To see code from a different point of view. Perhaps sharing reflections upon my past projects will give me better insight into how my future projects could improve.

What are Code Labs?

I decided to start this blog called "Code Labs" where I will be sharing code snippets I find interesting, cool coding concepts, and reflections on my personal project experience. I will also review awesome websites that help a person become a better software developer.

Wherever you are coming from and reading this right now, welcome to my portfolio and thank you for stopping by!
